resources.string: Stay up to date with your productivity.
Stay up to date with other users

The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method that helps improve productivity and focus. It involves working in short time intervals, called \'pomodoros\', followed by brief breaks. Plan your tasks, set a 25-minute timer, and focus on your task during that time. Then, take a short 5-minute break. Repeat this cycle several times, and then take a longer 15-minute break. This technique helps maintain concentration and increase productivity.
